questions.question: 1. What is the purpose of return statement in javascript ?

options.A: return the value and stops the program

questions.description: Use of return statement in Java. The last control statement is return. The return statement is used to explicitly return from a method. ... At any time in a method the return statement can be used to cause execution to branch back to the caller of the method.

questions.question: 2. The script tag must be placed in ?
questions.description: The <script> tag can be placed in the <head> section of your HTML, in the <body> section, or after the </body> close tag, depending on when you want the JavaScript to load..

questions.question: 3. A JavaScript program developed on a Unix Machine ?

options.B: must be restricted to a Unix Machine only
options.C: will work perfectly well on a Windows Machine
options.D: will be displayed as a JavaScript text on the browser

questions.description: A JavaScript program developed on a Unix Machine. A. will throw errors and exceptions. must be restricted to a Unix Machine only. will work perfectly well on a Windows Machine. will be displayed as a JavaScript text on the browser..

questions.question: 4. JavaScript is ideal to...

options.B: minimize storage requirements on the web server
options.C: increase the download time for the client

questions.description: A JavaScript program developed on a Unix Machine. A. will throw errors and exceptions. must be restricted to a Unix Machine only. will work perfectly well on a Windows Machine. will be displayed as a JavaScript text on the browser..

questions.question: 5. JavaScript can be written...

options.A: directly into JS file and included into HTML

questions.description: JavaScript is most commonly used as a client side scripting language. This means that JavaScript code is written into an HTML page. When a user requests an HTML page with JavaScript in it, the script is sent to the browser and it's up to the browser to do something with it.

questions.question: 6. Which of the following Attribute is used to include External JS code inside your HTML Document..
questions.description: Script “tag” is used to include the JavaScript code. To include external JavaScript files “src” attribute is used inside the script tag.

questions.question: 7. A proper scripting language is a..
questions.description: A scripting or script language is a programming language for a special run-time environment that automates the execution of tasks; the tasks could alternatively be executed one-by-one by a human operator. Scripting languages are often interpreted (rather than compiled).

questions.question: 8.Javascript is _________ language.
questions.description: Javascript (JS) is a scripting languages, primarily used on the Web. It is used to enhance HTML pages and is commonly found embedded in HTML code. JavaScript is an interpreted language. ... JavaScript renders web pages in an interactive and dynamic fashion..

questions.question: 9.The JavaScriptâ€™s syntax calling ( or executing ) a function or method is called....
10.The property of a primary expression is....
11. A function definition expression can be called....

options.A: Both a and b are equal in value, type and reference address
options.B: Both a and b are equal in value
options.C: Both a and b are equal in value and type

questions.question: 13. Which of the following is not considered as an error in JavaScript?
14.What will happen if reverse() and join() methods are used simultaneously?

options.A: Reverses and stores in the same array
options.B: Reverses and concatenates the elements of the array
options.D: Stores the elements of array in normal order

questions.description: The array.join() method is an inbuilt function in JavaScript which is used to join the elements of an array into a string. The reverse() followed by a join() will reverse the respective array and will store the reversed array in the memory.

questions.question: 15.The method or operator used to identify the array is...
questions.description: The typeof operator is used to get the data type (returns a string) of its operand. The operand can be either a literal or a data structure such as a variable, a function, or an object. The operator returns the data type.

questions.question: 16.The reduce and reduceRight methods follow a common operation called...
questions.description: The reduceRight() method reduces the array to a single value.The reduceRight() method executes a provided function for each value of the array (from right-to-left).The return value of the function is stored in an accumulator (result/total).Hence it does the operation of injecting and folding.

questions.question: 17.The primary purpose of the array map() function is that it...

options.A: maps the elements of another array into itself
options.B: passes each element of the array and returns the necessary mapped elements
options.C: passes each element of the array on which it is invoked to the function you specify, and returns an array containing the values returned by the function
options.D: pass the elements of the array into another way

questions.description: map() is a predefined function in javascript used for mapping the array elements to be used for some other purpose. The map() method passes each element of the array on which it is invoked to the function you specify, and returns an array containing the values returned by that function.
